statements: SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, country FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT organization_name, country FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT id, organization_name, country, rating FROM fact_checking_organizations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT organization_name, rating, country FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY organization_name ASC
SELECT id, organization_name FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE country='Canada' AND rating < 3
SELECT organization_name, country FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY country DESC
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations;
SELECT name, website FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE headquarters IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, claim, verdict FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE date_published >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, claim, verdict FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE verdict = 'True';
SELECT id, name, website, headquarters FROM fact_checking_organizations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, website FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE headquarters = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE date_published BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM fact_checking_findings GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT f.id, f.claim, o.name FROM fact_checking_findings AS f INNER JOIN fact_checking_organizations AS o ON f.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organization;
SELECT name, website_url FROM fact_checking_organization ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE rating = 'True';
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(*) FROM fact_checking_findings GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT tag_name FROM fact_checking_tags WHERE finding_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organization;
SELECT id, name, headquarters_location FROM fact_checking_organization;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE rating='True';
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(*) FROM fact_checking_findings GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT f.id, f.finding_text, t.tag_name FROM fact_checking_findings f JOIN fact_checking_tags t ON f.id = t.finding_id;
SELECT * FROM FactCheckOrganizations;
SELECT id, name, location FROM FactCheckOrganizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT finding_text, date_found FROM Findings ORDER BY date_found DESC;
SELECT name, website FROM FactCheckOrganizations WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Pol%';
SELECT * FROM FactCheckOrganizations;
SELECT name, location, website FROM FactCheckOrganizations WHERE location='USA';
SELECT f.finding_text, c.category_name FROM Findings f JOIN OrganizationCategories oc ON f.organization_id = oc.organization_id JOIN Categories c ON oc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT o.name, f.finding_text, f.date_found FROM FactCheckOrganizations o JOIN Findings f ON o.id = f.organization_id WHERE f.date_found >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT o.name, c.category_name FROM FactCheckOrganizations o JOIN OrganizationCategories oc ON o.id = oc.organization_id JOIN Categories c ON oc.category_id = c.id ORDER BY o.name DESC, c.category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT organization_name, headquarters_location FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE organization_name LIKE 'Fact%' ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE finding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT organization_name, COUNT(finding_id) AS total_findings FROM fact_checking_organizations JOIN fact_checking_findings ON fact_checking_organizations.organization_id = fact_checking_findings.organization_id GROUP BY organization_name HAVING total_findings > 5;
SELECT f.finding_id, f.finding_text, t.tag_name FROM fact_checking_findings f JOIN finding_tags t ON f.finding_id = t.finding_id ORDER BY f.finding_id ASC, t.tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fact_checking_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, headquarters_location FROM fact_checking_organizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT finding_text, finding_date FROM fact_checking_findings WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY finding_date DESC;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(finding_id) AS num_findings FROM fact_checking_categories JOIN fact_checking_findings ON fact_checking_categories.category_id = fact_checking_findings.finding_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT organization_name, rating_value FROM fact_checking_organizations JOIN organization_ratings ON fact_checking_organizations.organization_id = organization_ratings.organization_id WHERE rating_value > 4 ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
